name: Drill Hole Feature
description: Creates a Feature representing a drill hole in Beam. Specify multiple Beams to drill through all Beams with the same hole.

inputParameters.name: Line
inputParameters.description: Line representing the axis of the drill hole.

inputParameters.name: Diameter
inputParameters.description: The diameter of the drill hole

inputParameters.name: Length
inputParameters.description: The depth of the drill hole from the starting point of the line
